text: Audun Bj√∏rlo Lysbakken (born 30 September 1977) is a Norwegian politician. He was the leader of the Norwegian Socialist Left Party. His career in national politics began when he was elected to the Norwegian parliament in 2001. In 2006, he became deputy leader of the Socialist Left Party. He was the Minister of Children and Equality from October 2009 to March 2012. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Audun Lysbakken
